TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DisplayClaim extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usually, the display tag (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property) and the description (the Description property) are localized. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property identifies different claim types. The display value (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property) is the string representation of the claim.Resource.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> properties are set to default values based on the specified claim type. If default values do not exist for the properties, they are set to `null`.
